intro: Prepare to keep (or lose) your temper online!
description:
Play solo, with friends or online multiplayer

This beloved game classic offers even more game options: “Ludo XXL 2” brings the crazy dice-rolling fun straight to your living room – or, with the latest online multiplayer mode, even to Grandma and Grandpa on the other side of the world. This game guarantees laughter, dice-rolling, and (of course!) the occasional friendly flare-up of frustration. Enjoy a colorful mix of unpredictable good fortune and hilarity!

• This evergreen board game has been reissued for those who can't get enough playful frustration in their lives!
• Online dice fun: Play with friends and family around the globe.
• Variety guaranteed: 8 beautifully designed game boards, including 4 new ones.
• Three game modes, heated duels: Classic, Extra, and Extreme.
• Customizable rules: Play anyway you like.
• Up to 6 players: Exciting matches for all ages.
• Maximum flexibility: Locally or online, with real players or against AI.
